preloader.title:
This game is meant to be
played in vr mode with headphones
preloader.description: Select 3 rockets of the same colour and watch them explode!
preloader.note: This experience was designed for high performance devices. We recommend a minimum of iPhone 7, Galaxy S7 or similar.

desktop.title: Warning
desktop.description:
This experience is optimised for mobile devices.
We recommend that you use an Android device with Chrome or an iOS device with Safari.

unsupported.title: Warning
unsupported.description:
This experience is optimised for Safari (iOS) and Chrome (Android).
We recommend that you use one of these browsers.
unsupported.social:
You can open this site directly in your browser by clicking the menu
button in either the top-right or bottom-right of the screen.

nojs.title: JavaScript disabled
nojs.description: This website requires Javascript in order to work properly. Please enable Javascript.

social.title: VIVID | Web VR game
social.description: Match 3 fireworks and watch them explode in this new Web VR experience!
